text: RT @AdrienneLaF: “There is a longstanding debate among scientists and philosophers as to whether history has general laws. A basic premise of our study is that historical societies can be studied with the same methods physicists and biologists use to study natural systems.”https://t.co/MGri1Xngsw

name: TheAtlantic
text:
RT @edyong209: Here's a thing I want everyone to understand. 

There is a roughly 12-day lag between rising cases rising hospitalizations. 

So the 1.5 million (!!!) confirmed cases from the last 2 weeks have not yet factored into stories about packed emergency rooms. 

https://t.co/JID98tWjbt https://t.co/3DNeiX2esb
